name: Auto All Lights Off When Sun Rise
external rebirth of all devices from this node
function 1
function 2
Humidity Data
Humidity Data
set flow context Inputs
func:
// flow.set('isoInput1', Math.random() + 11.0) interval comes from server
//flow.set('isoInput2', Math.random() + 12.0) value comes from other flow/RIO analog input
flow.set('tank1Level', global.get('tank1Level'))
flow.set('tank2Level', global.get('tank2Level'))
flow.set('tank1Temperature', global.get('tank1Temperature'))
flow.set('tank1Humidity', global.get('tank1Humidity'))
flow.set('tank2Temperature', global.get('tank2Temperature'))
flow.set('tank2Humidity', global.get('tank2Humidity'))

msg.payload = [
    flow.get('tank1Level'),
    flow.get('tank2Level'),
    flow.get('tank1Temperature'),
    flow.get('tank1Humidity'),
    flow.get('tank2Temperature'),
    flow.get('tank2Humidity'),
]
return msg;
